title: TALON NEEDS A BUFF
body:
Talons e slows his enemy for 0.25 seconds
u are not even able to make use of ur passive with a short slow like that
as well he does not completely fill the role of an assassin becuase he has no escape after he used his dmg .
Talon needs a rebuff on his e or increased dmg on all abilities or he will never reach the power of a zed.
RIOT PLS MAKE THIS BEAUTIFUL CHAMP VIABLE AGAIN

replies.body:
Talon is übel stark, aber eben einer der Champs, bei denen man **spielen können muss**.Ich bin ein passionierter Talon spieler und erfolgreich gewesen, gegen yasuo sowie Leblanc, beide zzt. starke Midlaner.

Talon is strong but he just Needs skill!
